title: VimFu — Scroll Full Page Forward
description: Ctrl-F scrolls a full screen forward. When half a page isn't fast enough.

setup.comment: Set TERM for proper color support in Neovim

steps.say: Control D goes half a page. Control F goes a full page forward.
A whole screenful. We jumped past the first two functions.
End of the file in just two presses. Twice as fast as Control D.
Back. Now Control F — full page.
Control F. Full page forward. Use it when you want to fly through a file.
